name: First Day of School at Kennedy Middle
name_original: First Day of School at Kennedy Middle
description:
First Day is an interactive story featuring Ms. B, a brand new teacher in their first year at Kennedy, a Title I middle school. Get advice from colleagues such as Carla, the school registrar; Kiana, the guidance counselor; and Gerald, the school principal. Get to know your intrepid, curious, meme-loving 8th graders. Make fun of Elyas's shoes. And, most importantly: make the difficult decisions that teachers make every day.

Twenty minutes of content.

TW/CW: abuse mention, some mature language

Cover image made with DesignEvo

*****
